text: Kurilohadalia is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Kurilohadalia include: * Kurilohadalia brevis Sysoev & Kantor, 1986 * Kurilohadalia elongata Sysoev & Kantor, 1986 ==References== Category:Gastropod genera
title: Kurilohadalia
